label: Rare and Collectible Books
description: Books that are considered rare, valuable, or collectible.
intents: Find the value of old books

subcategories.label: Harry Potter First Editions
subcategories.description: First edition Harry Potter books, including signed copies.

subcategories.label: Children's Books
subcategories.description: Rare and collectible children's books, including Beatrix Potter and Enid Blyton.

subcategories.label: Illustrated Books
subcategories.description: Books with illustrations, including Alice in Wonderland and The Wind in the Willows.

subcategories.label: Folio Society Books
subcategories.description: Books published by the Folio Society.

subcategories.label: Comic Books
subcategories.description: Rare and collectible comic books, including Marvel and DC.
